vulnerability_findings.message:
Pie.Get (0xd2018bfaa266a9ec0a1a84b061640faa009def76.sol#8-13) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (0xd2018bfaa266a9ec0a1a84b061640faa009def76.sol#11)
